meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hokey or corny.
meanings.sent1: The hokeynesses of the movie made it hard to take seriously.
meanings.sent2: The hokeynesses of the song lyrics were evident in their simplicity.
meanings.sent3: The hokeynesses of the play added a touch of humor to the serious storyline.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was filled with hokeynesses, like a bad comedy routine.
meanings.sent5: The hokeynesses of the decorations made the party unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Instances of being overly sentimental or contrived.
meanings.sent1: The hokeynesses in the movie's dialogue were cringeworthy.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the hokeynesses in the romantic scenes.
meanings.sent3: The hokeynesses of the situation made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His excuses were just hokeynesses to cover up his mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The hokeynesses of the advertisement made it hard to take seriously.
